Full of scammers, guys who only want money from you, don't download it
This is an excellent app for staying in touch_sending stickers, little text notes and making free video calls, and I use it every day.  HOWEVER, on my Motorola Pure Edition phone, enormous internal storage is used up by the daily messages, little videos, etc.  Recently my phone, which has only 16 GB of internal storage, as well as a separate 60 GB SD card, kept informing me that my internal storage was almost full, and the phone might not work properly_  I'd moved all my photos to the SD card, and I suspected WeChat was causing the problem, but I couldn't find a way to delete its data.  Then I downloaded the File Manager app from Asus, and was able to locate two file folders that were left behind by Tencent_WeChat's developer_even after I'd uninstalled the app, and so I deleted those, and suddenly THREE GB of internal storage were released in the phone's internal memory_  Then I reinstalled WeChat.  So Tencent, please provide a simple and efficient way to clear out the built_up data so that the phone's internal memory doesn't get completely filled after a few months or weeks of use_

WeChat is a Chinese messaging and social media app. People can use it to send messages, post pictures, and use the free calling and video_calling functions. I use WeChat a lot to talk with family and friends that I have in China. I am able to video_call my family without having to pay any international fees_ The design is clean and simple, and users can customize their picture and background_ One thing that stands out about WeChat is the fact that I can locate other people who have this app. I can either look for people who are on WeChat and are nearby, or I can shake my phone and see who else is shaking at the same time_ It_s a great way to meet new people_ Messaging apps are fairly common nowadays, but I think that WeChat is pretty innovative in the fact that you can call and video_call people from all over the world for free_ For a free app, it has a lot of features and is pretty amazing_

Wechat is the first kind of messenging app that integrates social sharing within the communication. Facebook took an opposite route, i.e. bringing communication into social sharing, 2 years after. So what's the big deal here_  Wechat model is closer to the real human interaction pattern. You first agree to  start a conversation with a stranger. As you get to know the other person, you start to share your personal life story with them. You don't have to befriend with someone you just know.

Not up to mark
I have been waiting for days but V6.2 is still not available on my Android device. I need the new feature to transfer my chatting history to a new phone. Uploading to the cloud server never works for me, which is super frustrating. I had trouble logging into the PC version several times without any reason. My Internet connection is good so I assume it's a problem with the WeChat server. Typing long messages on a smartphone is not convenient so I would rather rely on the PC version instead. Also, when the messages generated on a PC version are synced to my phone, they sometimes are not in the correct chronological order. It's a great app but please pay attention to details while adding more and more non_essential functions for users out of China.

Hello. I love wechat. My friend and I use it a lot. But recently, we are forced to use Line more and more. The reason is that Line listens to our feedback and make updates. Wechat does NOT. We have been asking wechat to timestamp each message in a chat session. We have also asked wechat multiple times to add an indicator so that we know when each person is typing a message. Each request has been ignored so far _unfortunately_. Please consider your users feedback. We will not  need line if changes are made.

None
A few issues I've found  _ It's not possible to remain logged in on multiple devices. I have a pc_web_, tablet _ phone. If I login on another device I get logged out of the others. This is very inconvenient _ unlike viber, facebook etc _ The web ui doesn't allow for moments to be published _that I found_ _ scanning the qr code for the web ui was very problematic. the scanning green line was offset from the preview window. I ended up moving a long way from screen until the qr code was both in the preview window and crossed by the green scan line _ When making a video call using my android 4.4.2 tablet in landscape mode my outgoing video was sideways. When the screen was rotated the picture also rotated. Meanwhile incoming video in one orientation was badly stretched  Not sure I'm going to carry on using this, sweet but seems rather low on function and worse, very buggy

This app was recommended by a friend as a way for us to stay in touch.  Although only installed once, I would see two WeChat apps running in Settings_Running Apps  Would turn them off and they would nearly immediately reopen both instances.  The last time it cause my Samsung Galaxy S4 to overheat We Chat was using 100_ of the CPU, for what I don't know, I wasn't using the app and didn't ask it to do anything.  Are they mining Bit Coins, NSA style snooping, or what_  This is one fun and DANGEROUS app.  Now that it is uninstalled my S4 is back to normal CPU usage and is not overheating.  I emailed We Chat a week or two ago and never heard anything from them.  I can NOT recommend this app
